title: Digital Marketing Mastery
instructor_bio: Sarah is a seasoned digital marketing expert with over 10 years of experience helping brands grow their online presence. She specializes in SEO, SEM, and content marketing.
description_short: Master the art of digital marketing with hands-on projects and real-world case studies.
description_long: This comprehensive course covers everything you need to know to become a digital marketing pro. From understanding the fundamentals of SEO and social media marketing to mastering analytics and campaign optimization, you'll gain the skills and confidence to drive real results.

assessment.title: Final Project: Create a Digital Marketing Campaign
assessment.description: Apply everything you've learned to create a comprehensive digital marketing campaign for a fictional brand.

title: Brand Ambassador Certification
instructor_bio: Emma has built a career on creating authentic connections between brands and influencers. She has worked with top-tier companies to develop and manage their brand ambassador programs.
description_short: Learn how to become a successful brand ambassador and build lasting partnerships.
description_long: This certification program will equip you with the skills to represent brands effectively, negotiate contracts, and build a strong personal brand. You'll learn from industry experts and get a chance to connect with top agencies.

assessment.title: Final Exam
assessment.description: Test your knowledge on the key concepts of brand ambassadorship.
